title: Elgar: Portrait of a Composer
creator_credit: BBC, Humphrey Burton and Ken Russell
brief_description: The moving story of 19th Century English composer, Edward Elgar, told through Huw Wheldon’s commentary and Elgar’s own music. Against sweeping panoramas of the Malvern Hills, a major inspiration for Elgar, it blends archival footage with the stunning visual imagery characteristic of Ken Russell’s work.
